message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000.  I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a very competitive price.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $13,000?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12,500.
